Articles.Content:
Hey there,

My nick is Myrkul, I'm 20 years old and I'm from Spain!

I'm studying Telecommunications, and because of being engineer I can't stop experimenting, so everything I know about the game I've learnt it by myself

I've been a big fan of KSP for years, and finally I got it some months ago, but I'm introducing myself today . I really love the game, and I hope to have a nice time with all of you!

Hi. If you're not new to the game, then you'll have an easier time. People can tell the difference between noobs and pros pretty quick. And probably the most famous pro is Whackjob. (Next to Scott Manley, of course!)
